metadata.name: Space-Time Condominium
metadata.description: It's 1985 and the Multiverse is in Crisis. Luckily for Griffin Griffins, a mysterious man known only as The Gatekeeper is gathering Griffins from parallel Earths to live under one roof. But can Griffin survive living with four versions of himself? Containing a slew of bonus material, including the previously unreleased "unaired" pilot (three pages of which are featured below!), Space-Time Condo Season One is a must have for fans of sitcoms like Friends, Arrested Development and Seinfeld, as well af fans of DC's Crisis on Infinite Earths.
